title: Nutri-verde
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Buffet, Juice bar, Take-out, Argentinian
description: Small interior decorated with subtle colors, wooden tables, quiet music. Peaceful atmosphere. Buffet available. Dishes are offered as all-you-can-eat or by weight. Previously located on Alem 46 and named Azahares. Reported open to HappyCow, Oct. 2013.
